name: overfed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having been given too much food : An overfed horse which has too little exercise is likely to be over-excited. They are not malnourished, but they are certainly not overfed.
More examplesFewer examplesThe overfed birds swung heavily into the air.Every time he launched his overfed body a few inches off the ground, his T-shirt rode up to show off rolls of pink flesh.There is a fear that members of the overfed, under-exercised younger generation are destined to be the victims of an obesity epidemic.
